column5: Ranked 2nd in Western Europe for Corporate Finance (Eduniversal 2018), this programme is designed to help students develop the skills they need to excel in their chosen career within finance. Highly interactive lessons will provoke discussion and provide opportunities to develop presentation skills, deal with real-life case studies and work in group assignments.Ranked 21st in the world and 1st in Ireland in the Masters in Finance category - Times Higher Education/Wall Street Journal Rankings, 2018.92% rate of employment post-graduation.*
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
